supply.v: Widespread showers forecast for Minas Gerais all week; easing dryness concerns.
Domestic prices stable at 99,300 VND/kg. Farmers leveraging global deficit.

demand.v: Coca-Cola ends talks with PE bidders; bids failed to meet £2bn valuation.
R$ 1B investment to modernize century-old plant with Industry 4.0 tech.

futures.v: Managed Money reduced Arabica net-longs to 23,673 lots (down from 34.7k).

alerts.v: Cyclone Senyar damage to Aceh roads continues to delay Arabica shipments.
